summary: ENGINE ELECTRIC RECALL FOR ELECTRIC WATER PUMP.    CAR WAS BROUGHT INTO SERVICE AT TULLEY BMW IN NASHUA FOR ISSUE WITH WATER PUMP.   SERVICE ADVISOR SAID " ONLY NEED TO REPLACE A FEW BOLTS "   I FEEL THE CAR HAS ONLY 46,000 AND IS OVERHEATING TO EXCESS SHOWING TEMPERATURE GAGE.   HAD VEHICAL TOWED OVER 100 MILES TO LOCAL SERVICE STATION - FAILED ELECTRIC WATER PUMP -  " RECALL ISSUE "   DEALER FAILED TO SERVICE.   ENGINE IS OVERHEATING  - DEALER WANTS TO CHARGE $ 1,500.00 TO REPAIR
